data.name: Middle-earth™: Shadow of War™ High Resolution Texture Pack
data.detailed_description: From the City of Minas Ithil to the blasted slopes of Mt Doom, make Mordor your own with the incredible detail obtained from the High Resolution Texture Pack's ultra-high resolution textures.
data.about_the_game: From the City of Minas Ithil to the blasted slopes of Mt Doom, make Mordor your own with the incredible detail obtained from the High Resolution Texture Pack's ultra-high resolution textures.
data.short_description: High resolution textures bring Mordor and the Nemesis System to life like never before.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Arabic, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz / Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 390, 8GB / NVIDIA GTX 1070, 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: X64 required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Creators Update
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz / Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 390, 8GB / NVIDIA GTX 1070, 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: X64 required
